item.title: PIMCO 认为，在财政紧缩的情况下，降息是下一步救市的主导因素
item.description: 美国债券巨头 PIMCO 表示，由于发达市场的全球公共债务居高不下，限制了政府的支出能力，因此应对未来经济衰退的努力可能更多地依赖于央行降低利率，而不是财政救命稻草。【原文：Efforts to battle future economic downturns are likely to lean more on central banks slashing interest rates than on fiscal lifelines, as high global public debt in developed markets limits governments' ability to spend, said U.S. bond giant PIMCO.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，调解员就特朗普与哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）的诉讼提出 2,000 万美元的和解方案
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，一位调解人建议派拉蒙全球公司和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普就前副总统卡马拉-哈里斯接受采访一事与哥伦比亚广播公司新闻频道达成和解，和解金额为 2000 万美元。【原文：A mediator has proposed that Paramount Global and U.S. President Donald Trump settle his lawsuit against CBS News over an interview with former Vice President Kamala Harris for $20 million, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储公布放宽银行杠杆率要求的提案
item.description: 美联储周三公布了一项提案，将对全球大型银行必须为相对低风险的资产持有多少资本进行全面改革，作为促进参与美国国债市场的努力的一部分。【原文：The Federal Reserve unveiled a proposal on Wednesday that would overhaul how much capital large global banks must hold against relatively low-risk assets, as part of a bid to boost participation in U.S. Treasury markets.】

item.title: 大型汽车制造商批评美国汽车安全机构，呼吁改革
item.description: 代表通用汽车公司、丰田汽车公司、大众汽车公司、现代汽车公司和其他汽车制造商的一个主要贸易团体尖锐批评了美国国家公路交通安全管理局，称该汽车安全监管机构正在阻碍进步，并在努力实现现代化。【原文：A major trade group representing General Motors Toyota Motor , Volkswagen , Hyundai and other automakers sharply criticized the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, saying the auto safety regulator is impeding progress and struggling to modernize.】

item.title: 独家报道美国允许向中国装运乙烷，但不允许卸载 -- 信件
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，美国周三致函企业产品公司和能源转运公司，通知它们可以在驶往中国的船只上装载乙烷，但未经授权不得在中国港口卸载乙烷。【原文：The U.S. sent letters to Enterprise Products and Energy Transfer on Wednesday informing the companies they could load ethane on vessels destined for China but could not unload the ethane at a port in China without authorization, according to a person familiar with the matter and copy of one letter.】

item.title: 马姆达尼担任市长引发租金冻结担忧，纽约银行和房地产投资信托下跌
item.description: 由于佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）在纽约市民主党市长初选中遥遥领先，引发了人们对他提出的租金冻结方案可能会给楼宇业主带来压力的担忧，周三纽约多家银行和房地产投资信托公司股价下跌。【原文：Shares of several New York-based banks and real estate investment trusts fell on Wednesday as Zohran Mamdani's lead in New York City's Democratic mayoral primary stoked concerns that his proposed rent freeze could pressure building owners.】

item.title: 两家投资银行寻求摆脱美国证券交易委员会分析师研究和解协议的束缚
item.description: 派博桑德勒公司（Piper Sandler）和斯蒂夫尔金融公司（Stifel Financial）周三请求法官解除美国证券交易委员会二十多年前与 12 家投资银行就分析师冲突达成的全球和解协议对它们的 "苛刻 "限制。【原文：Piper Sandler and Stifel Financial on Wednesday asked a judge to free them from "onerous" restrictions from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's global settlement more than two decades ago with 12 investment banks over analyst conflicts.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道英国石油公司收购讨论后，壳牌称 "未进行谈判
item.description: 在《华尔街日报》的一篇文章援引未具名消息人士的话称壳牌正在就收购竞争对手英国石油公司（BP）进行早期讨论后，壳牌周三表示 "没有进行任何谈判"。【原文：Shell said on Wednesday that "no talks are taking place" after a Wall Street Journal article cited unnamed sources saying Shell was in early discussions to take over rival BP .】

item.title: 独家报道福特每周四天召集大部分员工上班
item.description: 福特汽车公司正在召集大部分受薪员工每周四天返回办公室，这是该汽车制造商为提高员工和公司业绩所做的最新努力。【原文：Ford Motor is calling the majority of its salaried workforce back to the office four days a week, the automaker's latest effort to boost employee and company performance.】

item.title: 独家报道马士基就价值 10 亿美元的巴西港口拍卖提起诉讼，地中海航运集团的 TIL 或将跟进
item.description: 全球航运集团正寻求巴西法院推翻禁止它们参与拉丁美洲最大港口新集装箱码头第一轮竞标的竞争规则，该竞标将于今年晚些时候举行。【原文：Global shipping groups are looking to Brazil's courts to overturn competition rules that bar them from participating in the first round of bidding on a major new container terminal at Latin America's largest port, due to take place later this year.】

item.title: 欧盟反垄断监管机构将调查玛氏 360 亿美元的 Kellanova 交易
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周三开始全面调查糖果制造商玛氏以 360 亿美元收购品客制造商凯兰诺华的交易，称该交易可能会损害竞争。【原文：EU antitrust regulators opened on Wednesday a full-scale investigation into candy maker Mars' $36 billion takeover of Pringles maker Kellanova , saying the deal may hurt competition.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称富国银行从花旗聘请帕特森负责激进主义辩护
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周三表示，富国银行已从花旗集团聘请了一位资深银行家来领导其激进主义防御业务，因为各家公司都在争相建立业务部门，以帮助面临激进投资者压力的客户。【原文：Wells Fargo has hired a senior banker from Citigroup to lead its activism defense practice, a person familiar with the situation said on Wednesday, as corporations scramble to build out business units to help clients facing pressure from activist investors.】

item.title: 智利锂矿开采商 SQM 开始裁减 5% 当地员工
item.description: 据路透社周三看到的一份发给工人的工会备忘录称，智利锂矿开采商 SQM 已开始在其智利业务中裁员。【原文：Chilean lithium miner SQM has begun laying off workers in its Chilean operations, according to a union memo to workers seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 微软因在人工智能训练中使用图书被作家起诉
item.description: 微软公司遭到了一群作家的起诉，他们声称微软公司在未经许可的情况下使用了他们的书来训练威震天人工智能模型。【原文：Microsoft has been hit with a lawsuit by a group of authors who claim the company used their books without permission to train its Megatron artificial intelligence model.】

item.title: 摩根资产管理公司推出最大的主动型 ETF
item.description: 摩根资产管理公司（J.P. Morgan Asset Management）周三宣布推出其最大的主动型交易所交易基金，该基金由外部机构客户投资 20 亿美元。【原文：J.P. Morgan Asset Management on Wednesday announced the launch of its largest active exchange-traded fund anchored by a $2 billion investment from an external institutional client.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，壳牌正就收购竞争对手英国石油公司进行早期谈判
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，壳牌正在就收购竞争对手英国石油公司（BP）进行早期谈判。【原文：Shell is in early talks to buy rival BP , the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普称正在考虑三四位美联储下任主席候选人
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统称美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔 "糟糕透顶"，并表示他认识三四个美联储下一任主席的竞争者。【原文：President Donald Trump called Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell "terrible" and said he knows three or four people who are contenders for the next chair of the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，富士康接近达成向三菱扶桑供应电动巴士的协议
item.description: 据日本《日经新闻》周四援引一位与富士康关系密切的消息人士的话报道，富士康即将达成一项协议，向日本商用车制造商三菱扶桑卡车和客车公司供应电动客车。【原文：Foxconn is nearing a deal to supply electric buses to Japanese commercial automaker Mitsubishi Fuso Truck and Bus, Japan's Nikkei newspaper reported on Thursday, citing a source close to the Taiwanese chipmaker.】

item.title: EIA 称需求增加导致美国原油和燃料库存下降
item.description: 美国能源信息署（EIA）周三称，由于炼油活动和需求上升，上周美国原油和燃料库存下降。【原文：U.S. crude oil and fuel inventories fell last week as refining activity and demand rose, the Energy Information Administration (EIA) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 5 月新屋销售降幅超预期；库存增加
item.description: 由于高抵押贷款利率抑制了需求，增加了市场上未售出房屋的供应量，5 月份美国新建独户住宅的销量降幅超过预期。【原文：Sales of new U.S. single-family homes fell more than expected in May as high mortgage rates sapped demand, boosting the supply of unsold houses on the market.】

item.title: 卡车司机协会主席敦促国会废除人工智能州法律禁令
item.description: 国际卡车司机兄弟会（International Brotherhood of Teamsters）主席周三敦促美国国会废除一项将在 10 年内有效禁止各州监管人工智能的提案，称其为 "社区和劳动人民的灾难"。【原文：The president of the International Brotherhood of Teamsters urged Congress on Wednesday to scrap a proposal that would effectively bar states from regulating artificial intelligence for 10 years, calling it "a disaster for communities and working people."】

item.title: 无人机需求推动 AeroVironment 股价飙升，季度业绩超预期
item.description: 受军用无人机需求持续增长的推动，AeroVironment 公司第四季度业绩超出华尔街预期，周三该公司股价飙升。【原文：AeroVironment's shares soared on Wednesday after the company beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter results, driven by sustained demand for its military drones.】

item.title: 业主称关闭的三哩岛核电站可能于 2027 年重启
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州前三里岛核电站的所有者星座能源公司（Constellation Energy）的高管周三表示，该核电站可能会在 2027 年重新启动，比原计划提前一年左右。【原文：The former Three Mile Island nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania may restart in 2027, about a year ahead of schedule after being put on a fast track to connect to the regional grid, executives with the plant's owner Constellation Energy said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔警告不要终止美联储支付储备金利息的权力
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三表示，央行向银行存放在央行的现金支付利息的权力是美联储利率控制工具包的关键部分，很难解除。【原文：Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said Wednesday that the central bank's power to pay interest on cash that banks park at the central bank is a key part of the Fed's interest rate control toolkit and would be difficult to unwind.】

item.title: 文件显示，黑狮集团以 80 亿美元现金竞购 Citgo 母公司
item.description: 私募股权公司 Black Lion Capital Advisors 的关联公司 Black Lion Citgo Group 在周三发布的一份法院文件中表示，该公司提交了一份 80 亿美元的全现金竞购委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司的报价，这是法院组织的股权拍卖的一部分。【原文：Black Lion Citgo Group, an affiliate of private equity firm Black Lion Capital Advisors, submitted a $8-billion all-cash bid for the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum as part of a court-organized auction of shares, the company said in a court filing released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 三星在与中兴通讯的英国专利战中赢得临时许可证
item.description: 三星电子周三赢得了伦敦高等法院的一项裁决，三星试图获得使用中兴通讯专利的临时许可，这是两家公司关于手机专利的全球许可纠纷的英国部分。【原文：Samsung Electronics on Wednesday won a ruling from London's High Court in its attempt to get an interim licence to use ZTE's patents, in the English leg of the firms' global licensing dispute over mobile phone patents.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为 2025 年美国将因关税引发 "滞胀 "经济放缓
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）分析师周三表示，美国的贸易政策可能会减缓全球经济增长，并重新引发美国的通货膨胀，今年下半年美国经济衰退的可能性为 40%。【原文：U.S. trade policies will likely slow down global economic growth and rekindle inflation in the United States, where there is a 40% probability of a recession in the second half of this year, JPMorgan analysts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国政治阻碍了针对谷歌的反垄断行动
item.description: 英国的竞争监管机构终于提出了一项控制谷歌庞大搜索业务的计划，但政治风向的转变有利于大型科技公司及其投入的资金，这使得该计划与其说是 "咬"，不如说是 "吠"。【原文：Britain's competition regulator has finally come up with a plan to control Google's huge search business, but a shift in the political wind in favour of big tech and the money it invests makes it more of a bark than a bite.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称今年晚些时候可能降息
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周三表示，她预计央行将在今年晚些时候降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said Wednesday she is expecting the central bank to cut interest rates later this year.】

item.title: Ulta Beauty 首席财务官 Paula Oyibo 离职，内部人士被任命为临时财务总监
item.description: Ulta Beauty 周三表示，其财务总监 Paula Oyibo 在任职一年多后离职，并任命内部人士 Chris Lialios 担任临时首席财务官。【原文：Ulta Beauty's finance chief Paula Oyibo has departed after a little over a year in the role, it said on Wednesday, and named insider Chris Lialios as its interim CFO.】
